text: Don't give up. There are too many nay-sayers out there who will try to discourage you. Don't listen to them. The only one who can make you give up is yourself.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Airplanes may kill you, but they ain't likely to hurt you.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Just take the ball and throw it where you want to. Throw strikes. Home plate don't move.
author: Satchel Paige

text: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
author: Satchel Paige

text: If your stomach disputes you, lie down and pacify it with cool thoughts.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines.
author: Satchel Paige

text: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Work like you don’t need the money. Love like you’ve never been hurt. Dance like nobody’s watching.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Any big league starter who hits .200 shouldn't be where he is. He ought to be waiting outside the gate to get in the park.
author: Satchel Paige
